short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your reading experience of JW official site and Watchtower Online Library (WOL) with Refined JW

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üÜï Experimental and new features (current version 1.7.0)

‚ñ∂Ô∏è Easily follow video transcriptions with the newest ‚ú® click and jump through video ‚ú®  feature, and download subtitles of any video.
üìñ Reading time estimation for every article.
‚å®Ô∏è Quick access to shortcuts drawer by holding Shift key down one second. It will display only relevant shortcuts now.

Stable features:

- Extract all the quotes from the selected text.
- Add comments in the gems or study articles and know immediately how much time will take you to say it.
- Seen video indicator and resume playback
- In page popup provides better context when looking for a tool provided by Refined JW
- Inline stopwatch improved, rehearse your comments time!
- Highlight using the same colors available in JW Library and [NEW] delete them with a simple click.
- Select text and search it in a new tab, with just one shortcut.
- Skip audio recordings quickly to previous or next verse, paragraph or section.
- Useful keyboard controls for any media content, recordings, audio, video.
- Navigation shortcuts added, go to main page, bible, publications or meetings with a simple keyboard shortcut.
- Support dark and light modes.

...and much more.
